meta.title: ComplexRulePost - Models - API Reference
meta.description: The model for a POST to create a complex rule on a product.

blocks.data: The model for a POST to create a complex rule on a product.

product_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the product with which the rule is associated; increments sequentially.

sort_order.description: The priority to give this rule when making adjustments to the product properties.

enabled.description: Flag for determining whether the rule is to be used when adjusting a product's price, weight, image, or availabilty.

stop.description: Flag for determining whether other rules should not be applied after this rule has been applied.

purchasing_disabled.description: Flag for determining whether the rule should disable purchasing of a product when the conditions are applied.

purchasing_disabled_message.description: Message displayed on the storefront when a rule disables the purchasing of a product.

purchasing_hidden.description: Flag for determining whether the rule should hide purchasing of a product when the conditions are applied.

adjuster.description: The type of adjuster for either the price or the weight of the variant, when the modifier value is selected on the storefront.

adjuster_value.description: The numeric amount by which the adjuster will change either the price or the weight of the variant, when the modifier value is selected on the storefront.

adjuster.description: The type of adjuster for either the price or the weight of the variant, when the modifier value is selected on the storefront.

adjuster_value.description: The numeric amount by which the adjuster will change either the price or the weight of the variant, when the modifier value is selected on the storefront.

items.description: The model for a POST to create conditions on a complex rule.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the rule condition; increments sequentially.

rule_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the rule with which the condition is associated.

modifier_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the modifier with which the rule condition is associated.

modifier_value_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the modifier value with which the rule condition is associated.

variant_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the variant with which the rule condition is associated.
